name: matcha-docker
description: Scripts Docker pour le projet Matcha

scripts.docker:setup: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up && npm run docker:db:init && npm run docker:db:seed
scripts.docker:clean: docker compose down -v --remove-orphans && docker system prune -f
scripts.docker:db:init: docker compose exec backend node scripts/createTables.js
scripts.docker:db:seed: docker compose exec backend node scripts/fillDatabase.js
scripts.dev: npm run docker:up && npm run docker:logs

author: Axel Fernandez
